interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Aloe Hand Sanitizer 24 Pack Dearskin Aloe Vera Moisturizing Alcohol 75% Gel 2 Fl Oz/60ml Skin Care Natural Advanced Formula Alcohol Refreshing Moisturizing with Argine.
Review Date: 2020/12/31
Store: Dearskin
Product Description: ['24 Pack Dearskin Hand Sanitizer 60ml, 2 Fl Oz', 'Dearskin Hand sanitizer Kills 99.9% of the most common germs!', '- Clean and Refreshing Moisturizing;', '- Long-Lasting Antibacterial;', '- Easy to use, hard to waste; -', '75% Alcohol;', 'Drug Facts: Active ingredients: - Alcohol 75% v/v. Antiseptic. Use: Hand sanitizer to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease. For use when soap and water are not available. For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from or flame. Do not use: - In children less than 2 months of age. - On open skin wounds. When using this product keep out of eyes, and mouth. In case of contact with eyes, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash occurs. These may be sings of a serious condition. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Directions: - Place enough product on hands to cover all surfaces. Rub hands together until dry. - Supervise children under 6 years of age when use this product to avoid swallowing. Other information: Store between 15-30C (59-86F). Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F). Inactive ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Carbomer, Arginine. Distributed by: Dearskin LLC, FL.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dearskin', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Travel Size, Moisturizer', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 4 x 4 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '850005863359', 'Manufacturer': 'Dearskin'}
Review Text: Smells amazing!
Review Title: Smells amazing
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
20 PCS Zoostliss Nail Polish Remover Clips
Zoostliss
{'Brand': 'Zoostliss', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Unit Count': '20 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 5.1 x 1.8 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
I got these nail polish remover because when ever I’m doing a soak off on a client or myself, I usually use a manicure bowl to soak them off but I find that when ever I’m doing that I’m wasting my acetone so I got these so that I won’t be wasting so much of my acetone. I gave this product 4 stars because the package did come kind of open and there was a very strong perfume like odor but I’ll just soak these in soap and barbecide.
Very nice but has an odor
Cortex International Black Series Duo Platinum 1.25-Inch & 0.5 Inch Travel Size Gemstone Infused Ceramic Plates Duet Flat Iron (Rose Wood)
Cortex

LEAP Lemongrass Hand Soap, Natural & Moisturizing Lather, Gentle & Rinses Clean, Made with Organic Oils, Cruelty Free & Vegan, Liquid Hand Wash, Superbly Designed, 12 fl oz
Leap Organics

The hand soap scent is not the best to me. After using this soap for a while the soap leaves a lemon grass smell mix with this other scent that I don’t know how to describe but I don’t really like the smell of the scent. The soap itself is great though the texture is more of a gooey slime feeling compare to other soaps that I have used
Weird texture

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preference for Efficiency**: The user continues to prioritize beauty products that enhance routine efficiency and minimize waste, valuing solutions that are functional and practical.

- **Professional Application**: Likely involved in the beauty services industry, they select products that support both personal care and client experiences. They have an interest in tools that are beginner-friendly, particularly in nail care.

- **Practicality Over Aesthetics**: Functionality remains paramount, with a focus on effective utility rather than aesthetic appeal. They accept minor imperfections while maintaining high standards for overall quality.

- **Quality Expectations**: With a discerning eye for detail, they favor high-quality items that suit their needs. Positive evaluations are tempered by recognition of operational issues in some tools, reflecting their nuanced assessment approach.

- **Satisfaction with Room for Improvement**: They typically rate products around 4 stars, though recent evaluations indicate higher satisfaction levels for effective items, while still providing constructive feedback for those that encounter issues.

- **Diverse Tool Preferences**: The user is open to exploring various beauty tools, appreciating a blend of efficiency and elegance, as shown by their acceptance of products that are both functional and pleasing to the senses.

Overall, the user maintains a pragmatic approach to beauty care, emphasizing functionality, quality, and a favorable sensory experience while remaining critical and discerning in their evaluations.
